WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
SARDINIA TO BALEARIC ISLANDS.
DNC 08.
10.5 METER S/V YALLA, ONE PERSON ON BOARD,
OVERDUE SARDINIA (40-00-00N 009-00-00E)
TO MINORCA (39-58-00N 004-05-00E). VESSELS IN
VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC LA GARDE,
TELEX: 430024, PHONE: 334 9461 1616,
FAX: 334 9427 1149, E-MAIL: LAGARDE@MRCCFR.EU.
